alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Dublin affecting Wilkinson, Laurens, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County. Echeconnee Creek near Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron affecting Houston, Bibb, Crawford and Peach Counties. Little River near Washington affecting Wilkes and Taliaferro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little River near Washington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, Minor flooding expands further into the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage at Lundberg Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 22.2 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 19 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
